verses.text: Ach wuninal, manh ak' sat a k'ool t'a juntzanh in k'ayb'ub'al tik. Sik'kan in checnab'il tik t'a a pensar,
yic wach' ol najatb'oc a k 'inal yuj, tzalajk'olalnhej ol ach ek'oc.
Manh actejcan a b'eyb'alan wach'il, tza k'anab'ajejnhej tas ix ala'. Cham wal a naani, satta a k'ool t'ay.
Yuj chi' wach' ach ol ach yil Dios, ol ach b'inajpax yuj heb' anima.
Ak'nhejoch a pensar t'a Jehová, manh ak'och a jelanil yipoc a k'ool.
Nacot Jehová t'a masanil tas tza k'ulej yic wach' a ol kolwaj ed'oc t'a smasanil.
Manh a na' to te jelan ach, niwanocab' yelk'och Jehová t'ayach, tzik'el a b'ha t'a skal chukal.
Tato icha chi' tza k'ulej, junk'olal ol ach ajoc, tek'an ol ach ajoc.
Ch'oxeli to niwan yelk'och Jehová t'ayach. Tzak'an junok ofrenda t'ay t'a tas ay t'ayach yet' pax t'a juntzanh sb'ab'el sat tas tzawej.
Tato icha chi' tza k'ulej, malaj b'ak'uinh ol yak' palta a wael yet' tas tzuk'ej.
Ach wuninal, manh a patiquejel scachnab'il Jehová, mocab' cot owal ayic tzach stumani.
Yujto a heb' xajanab'il yuj, aton heb' chi' scacha', icha wal tz'aj scachan yuninal junok mamab'il to stzalaj yet'oc.
Tzalajk'olal yic heb' syik' sjelanil, aton heb' te ay spensar.
Yujto a tas tz'ik'ji t'a juntzanh chi' yelxo te wach' t'a yichanh tas tz'ik'ji t'a k'een plata, ma k'een oro.
Ha jelanil chi', yelxo wal te wach' t'a yichanh swach'il yilji k'een tz'och colk'ab'il. Max yal-laj ko lajb'an jun jelanil chi' yet' juntzanhxo tastac te nib'ab'il.
Yuj jelanil chi' ol najatb'oc a k 'inal, yuj ol ik' a b'eyumal, ol ach b'inaj pax yuj.
Tato sco b'eyb'alej jelanil, tzalajk'olal tzonh eq'ui, junk'olal tzonh aji.
Tato tz'ilchaj jelanil cuuj, ay ko k 'inal, wach' ol onh ek'oc, tzalajk'olal quico'.
Ha Jehová ixb’o’an satcha’anh yet' sat lum tik yuj sjelanil yet' yaj pensaril.
Yuj sjelanil chi' sk'eul sjaj ha ha', scotpax yal ak'wal t'a skal asun.
Ach wuninal, manh actejcan a jelanil yet' a wach' pensaril, manh ik'el a sat t'ay.
Yujto ol najatb'oc a k 'inal yuj, wach' ol ach elk'och t'a sat heb' anima yuj.
Te junk'olalnhej ol ach ek'oc, malaj b'ak'uinh ay tas ol ach ik'anoc.
Ayic ol ik'an ip, malaj mach b'aj ol ach xiwoc, t'a tzalajk'olal ol ach wayoc.
Yujto ayoch Jehová yipoc a k'ool, yuj chi' manh ol ach schacan t'a junok yaal, manh ol a na' to ay tas ol ja t'a ib'anh, icha sja t'a yib'anh heb' chuk sb'eyb'al.
Manh ach b'at mican t'a heb' sk'anan colwal t'ayach tato syal tzach kolwaj t'a heb'.
Tato syal a kolwaj ticnaik, mocab' ala' to k'ik'anto tzach colwaji.
Manh a na ak' chukal t'a heb' cajan t'a a lak'anil, yujto malaj schab'k'olal heb' t'ayach.
Manh ik'b'at heb' etanimail t'a yichanh heb' yajal tato malaj tzach yutej heb'.
Manh a nib'ejoch b'eyumal icha syutej sb'a heb' malaj jab'oc yok'elk'olal, manh a k'ulej icha sb'eyb'al heb' chi'.
Yujto max scha sk'ool Jehová heb' chuk syutej sb'a chi', haxo pax heb' wach' syutej sb'a, wach' yak'an yet' heb'.
Scot scatab' Jehová t'a yib'anh heb' chuk sb'eyb'al yet' t'a yib'anh heb' cajan yet' heb', haxo pax t'a heb' tojol sb'eyb'al, syak' swach'k'olal.
Sb'uchwaj Jehová t'a heb' b'uchumtac, haxo t'a heb' emnaquil syutej sb'a, syak' swach'k'olal.
Ha heb' sb'eyb'alan wach'il, ol ik'jocchaanh heb', haxo heb' chuk spensar, ol ak'joc q'uixwelal heb'.
